app.upload.private.description: Drag and drop your Kindle clippings file to share your favorite passages
app.upload.file.hint: Your file will be processed automatically when dropped here
app.upload.private.on.description: Your clippings will be visible only to you
app.upload.private.off.description: Your clippings will be shared with the community
app.upload.tips.wait: Please wait while we process your clippings
app.upload.help.title: Need Help?
app.upload.help.how_to_title: How to export your Kindle clippings
app.upload.help.how_to_description: Connect your Kindle to computer via USB, and find the "My Clippings.txt" file in Documents folder.
